attributes.action: Bus companies should provide toilet facilities for drivers along their routes.
attributes.background: We believe that an appropriate amount of toilet facilities should be available on all bus routes. The lack of toilet facilities for Bus Drivers is just not acceptable and Bus companies should make providing access to toilet facilities a priority.

rejection.details:
Providing these facilities is the responsibility of bus companies.

If you wanted legislation to require toilet facilities to be provided for bus drivers, you could start a petition about that.
